item.title: Tools for Thought
item.description: Welcome to a page on using technology to think and learn more effectively. This section aims to answer three questions How can LLMs be used to extend pre-existing flashcards (Anki or otherwise) to push our understanding and facilitate learning? How to incentivize big-tech investments in Tools for Thought? Why are Tools for Thought important? How do we get people to examine what they know more often? See example.
